# Schaunaman Ranch  
::: {.callout-note title="Weather"}
üå¶Ô∏è High 70s, cloudy, some drizzle in the morning. Sooooo many mosquitos ü¶ü.
:::

Eric and I left Bozeman at 6 AM on Sunday, August 31 - driving through Eastern Montana to Aberdeen, SD. On Monday morning, we left Aberdeen and headed to the Schaunaman Ranch just west of Town. We visited the site to get data from our *Rhinusa pilosa* monitoring grids and *M. janthinus* transects.

Site activities:

- Collected grid data
- Downloaded temperature data from Hobo loggers 
- Retrieved images from and completed any maintaince work on trail cameras

# Sand Lake and Bergdorf WPAs
::: {.callout-note title="Weather"}
üå¶Ô∏è Mid 80s, mostly sunny.
:::
On Tuesday, we headed north to visit our other sites - the Sand Lake and Bergdorf WPAs up by Long Lake, SD. Thankfully, there were much fewer mosquitos as these sites. We visited the site to get data from our *Rhinusa pilosa* monitoring grids and *M. janthinus* transects.

Site activities:  

- Collected grid data
- Downloaded temperature data from Hobo loggers 
- Retrieved images from and completed any maintaince work on trail cameras
